function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation and air circulation in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems and air circulation, implement air purification technologies","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, ventilation engineers"},{"Description":"Lack of surface hygiene and cleaning protocols","Impact":"Higher likelihood of surface-to-person transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement regular and thorough cleaning protocols, promote good hygiene practices","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV sanitation systems","People":"Cleaning staff, building occupants","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","Impact":"Increased potential for person-to-person spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit occupancy, reconfigure spaces","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, crowd monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, event attendees","Owner":"Event organizers, facility management"}]}
